entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 10:30 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: WNW 38 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
